identity.mission: Create a catchy, clean, and modern full-stack development service platform that breaks generic SaaS tropes.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Brutalism with High-Tech sleekness.
Emotion First: Evoke competence, speed, and precision.
Content is King: Every pixel must serve the narrative of 'Elite Engineering'.
Negative Space: Use it aggressively to create a premium feel.

theme.name: The Midnight Protocol
theme.strategy: High-Contrast Dark Mode with Vibrant Accents
theme.description: A deep void background (#050505) grounded by indigo/violet accents. Crisp, high-contrast text for readability. Glassmorphism used strictly for navigation and overlays.

body.description: Highly readable, standard for technical content.

mono.description: For code snippets and technical data.

grids.marketing: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 (Mode A: Tetris Grid)
grids.dashboard: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 (Mode B: High Density)

cards.effect: Tracing Beam hover effect or subtle inner glow.

inputs.style: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-12

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Animated gradient border for high-value cards.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Subtle grain overlay on backgrounds to prevent flatness.
visual_enhancers.glows: Radial gradients behind key elements (Hero, CTAs).

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for marketing).

landing.hero_sub: Full-stack development, seamless deployment, and rigorous QA. We build what's next.

services.layout: Detailed feature grid with code snippets as visuals.

dashboard.layout: Sidebar navigation, top header, dense data grid.
dashboard.theme: Strictly functional, reduced noise, high data density.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is WCAG AA compliant. Use lighter grays (e.g., #e2e8f0) on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.interactive: Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-primary).

universal_guidelines: Do not apply 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Use data-testid attributes for all interactive elements.
Avoid generic gradients; use subtle, deep gradients.
Never center-align the main app container.
instructions_to_main_agent: Read this file first. Install 'lucide-react', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge' if missing. Implement the ThemeProvider to handle the dark mode preference (default to dark). Build the 'Hero' section with the 'tracing beam' concept if possible, or high-quality CSS gradients.
